title: A conference with Mr. Claude, minister of Charenton, concerning the authority of the church by James Benigne Bossuet, Bishop of Meaux ... ; faithfully done into English out of the French original.
author: Bossuet, Jacques Bénigne, 1627-1704.
notes: Translation of: Conférence avec M. Claude, ministre de Charenton, sur la matière de l'eglise.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
